Tips:
If it is a dynamic shape scenario, it is recommended to set torch_npu.npu.set_compile_mode(jit_compile=False) above the training entry file; if it is a fixed shape scenario, it is recommended to set torch_npu.npu.set_compile_mode(jit_compile=True) above the training entry file.
For more information, please refer to: https://www.hiascend.com/document/detail/zh/canncommercial/700/modeldevpt/ptmigr/AImpug_000060.html
If you want to improve performance, please set environment variables 'export TASK_QUEUE_ENABLE=1'.
If you want to improve performance, please set environment variables 'export HCCL_OP_BASE_FFTS_MODE_ENABLE=TRUE'.

To optimize communication between devices, it is recommended to set non_blocking to True.
For more information, please refer to: https://www.hiascend.com/document/detail/zh/canncommercial/700/modeldevpt/ptmigr/AImpug_000055.html
